content:
Hi All,

I have a few questions about the FHIRPath spec:

  1. GitHub page for the spec is here? https://github.com/HL7/FHIRPath
  2. In item#1 github page, I see 3 tags. Does the 2018May-Ballot tag correspond to FHIRPath STU1 release (i.e. http://hl7.org/fhirpath/)?
  3. Does the 2019May-Ballot tag correspond to FHIRPath 1.2.0 (i.e. http://hl7.org/fhirpath/2018Sep/index.html)?
  4. I presume FHIR STU3 uses FHIRPath STU1 while FHIR R4 uses FHIRPath 1.2.0. Please confirm.
you should look here for the spec versions:
